meanings.sent1: The car progresses down the road.
meanings.sent2: She progresses through the levels of the game.
meanings.sent3: The turtle progresses slowly but steadily towards the finish line.
meanings.sent4: As time progresses, technology advances at a rapid pace.
meanings.sent5: The river progresses steadily towards the ocean, never looking back.

meanings.sent1: His skills progress with each practice session.
meanings.sent2: The students progress in their understanding of the subject.
meanings.sent3: The plant progresses in growth under the care of the gardener.
meanings.sent4: Like a caterpillar, she progresses through stages of transformation.
meanings.sent5: With each stroke of the brush, the painting progresses towards completion.

meanings.definition: To make progress or move towards a goal
meanings.sent1: They progress towards their dream of owning a home.
meanings.sent2: The team progresses towards winning the championship.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel progresses in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The project progresses steadily towards its deadline.
meanings.sent5: With determination, she progresses towards her goal of running a marathon.
